name: Skybox
description:
You play as a stone that has to get to the finish line and a skateboard helps him in this.
You have no control over anything but the turns of the skate wheels. Give in to freedom and enjoy the ride.

You have to go through the same level dozens of times before you reach the goal, but should that scare you?

Game Features:
- 2 Completely different locations
- 10 different levels in each location
- Unusual gaming experience
- Challenging physics to overcome the road
- Dynamic music that will keep you in good shape throughout the journey
